DOC.brief_summary: Current diagnostic tools used in pulmonary disease often do not meet the challenges set by the respective pathophysiology. The investigators therefore aimed to evaluate novel or not widely used diagnostic approaches for the detection and therapeutic monitoring of patients with various pulmonary diseases.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Novel Lung Function Parameters and Quantitative Computed Tomography (qCT) in Patients With Pulmonary Disease
DOC.criteria: known or suspected pulmonary lung disease indication for computed tomography pregnancy inability to participate
